title: About Us

sections.text: My name is Oleg Makhnichev, and I am an independent procurement and supply chain consultant based in Germany. With 20 years of international experience in procurement, logistics, and contract negotiation, I assist German and European companies in sourcing products effectively from Ukraine and other Eastern European countries.

I collaborate closely with a trusted and skilled team in Ukraine, operating primarily from two key logistics hubs: Dnipro and Lviv. Our local presence enables efficient product sourcing, thorough inspections, local purchasing, and tailored repackaging services prior to export.
We guarantee full transparency and accountability. As a registered freelance consultant operating under German tax law, I ensure compliance with all relevant regulations.

Our mission is to make your cooperation safe, productive, and culturally seamless. We speak German, English, Ukrainian, and Russian fluently, bridging Western and Eastern European business cultures to deliver prompt, professional, and culturally sensitive service.
Whether you require reliable sourcing, comprehensive market research, logistics solutions, or assistance communicating with Ukrainian partners, I am ready to support you every step of the way.
